replies.body: And then there'll be the complaints about poor matchmaking quality. Can't have everything
There are already complaints about poor matchmaking quality.
Which will be even worse in a game mode with only a small amount of people playing it. Which is why normal draft got removed in the first place

You think Draft pick will make it any better?

Unless if first or second pick wants support, last pick is typically forced to support, this causes way more dodges.

Doesn't bother me, and tbh i think support should be learned alot more then it is. its a really good carry role tbh.

if people decide to dodge, FINE! how does that effect me?, i wont have a scaling dodge timer. i'll be in another champ select.

i accept i wont always get the role i want, and i think everyone will need to grow up and accept this aswell, and if they cant accept this then there is always punishment for their behavior.

but i'd rather have RNG decide what i play with less negativity tbh.
